version_description:
Version 7.0 features dozens of newly added features, gameplay expansions, graphical improvements, and enhancements of the user interface, which makes the game more addictive and enjoyable than ever.

NEW THEME:
- ’80s neonpunk sci-fi setting for retro computer enthusiasts

GAMEPLAY EXPANSIONS:
- Comeback reward every day for all faithful Nyan-gamer
- Golden Donut: a flying golden donut (it really is!), which gives you a special something upon catch
- Big Nyan powerup: grow big and shake the world after Nyan Cat transforms into a large four-legged
- Pianyano powerup: play your favourite tunes and raise your combo score when every platform transforms into a piano
- Flower Fever powerup: plant colorful flowers and raise your combo score with each step after picking up the flower of flowers
- Disco Tour powerup: this party item brings back memories from famous Saturday nights
- Headstart boost: activate headstart to go right into the action and begin the play with 10.000 points instead of zero (cool handicap, huh?)
- Game Day is now playable in all Game Modes

GRAPHICAL IMPROVEMENTS:
- Particles everywhere: eat something, meet with the Golden Donut, make an explosion, pick up the Bubble powerup, or fall from great heights and you’ll see cool particles everywhere
- Shield boost appears on the head up display: now you can see the activated shield boost ingame
- Nyan Love, Supernyan, Rocketnyan and Magnets are visually more enthralling
- Nyan deaths & fallings are visually more dramatic
- UFO attacks are visually more scary
- Sicknyan powerup is visually more psychedelic
- Nyan trail changes it’s color depending on the activated power up & diamonds
- And much more

USER INTERFACE ENHANCEMENTS:
- Free coin options are now displayed on the Main Menu too
- Game Center access from the Game Over screen
- Floating texts are more visible during gameplay

new theme: hell
new theme: alice
new skin pack: anime pack
bug fix: crash on some devices

Skin editor! You can dream and then create your own Nyan Cats and play with them!

Every theme and skin is 50% cheaper! Isn't it cool?

3 new nyantastic themes:
-Super Nyanio
-Another Nyan
-Nyan Park!

You can revive for FREE! (by watching a video)

Bug fixes and other improvements.

-crash bugs and other issues fixed
-share option in the skin editor (touch the camera icon)
-improved skin editor: ability to draw when you move your fingers on the screen
-two new themes: Nyan Wars and Pirates
-"Child mode" is back in the options menu
-video recording behavior changed: it's turned off each time you restart the App
bug fixes
A new theme: Mad Cat!

- Game size has been significantly reduced to save up storage space
- User interface visuals have been improved
- Several bugs have been smashed

- Warrior achievement now requires only 10 enemies to be taken care of
- Veteran achievement has been made easier with a requirement of 100 enemies eliminated
- UFO Visitor has also been made easier and now needs 25 UFO abduction survives
- Bug fixes

Nyan Cat: Lost In Space is back with an Aztec World Theme update!
Enjoy the beauty!
Sakura Theme filled with tons of cherry blossoms has been added!
A Nyanlympian theme has been added to honor to Olympic Games and all of its participants!

Nyat Cat is back with an update:
- Rusnyan City Theme has been added
- Some minor bugs have been splashed

Yet another nyantastic update has taken over the galaxy:
- The sticker pack has received a MAJOR update
- Wacky Zombie Theme has been added to the theme pool
- Some other minor updates and fixes have been made

- Nyan Heroes Theme has been added
- A few bugs have been obliterated

- 1 new theme: Gingerbread Land
- Game balance adjustments
- Various bugfixes for a carefree Nyan-experience
Bug fixes and small improvements
Bug fixes

Walking Nyan Cats on the streets of Nyan City!
Bug fixes

-Nyan Cat has fallen in love with iPhone X
-Some minor bugs are smashed
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

Reduced App size
Improved performance
Bug fixes and small improvements

Let us introduce a skill system in the game!
All of your worlds and skins have a special skill which makes them unique and helps you to earn more scores and coins. For your custom nyan cat skin you can craft up to 3 skills!

5 new boosts to improve your scores and make the gameplay even smoother

Multinyan power up improvements

Improved stability

GUI polishments

-Prepare for World Cup 2018!
-GDPR compliant
4 new nyantastic power ups have been added! Explore Zombie Attack, Fireworks, Champagne and Gem Gun!

-greatly reduced app size
-performance improvements
-bug fixes
Bug fixes

New game mode: NYAN CITY BUILDER!

-Build, expand, decorate your city
-Explore and rebuild ancient temples to unlock 7 NEW WORLDS with unique abilities.
-Build special buildings to help you in classic game modes
-Find secret gifts on the map

Build the most beautiful and happiest Nyan City ever!


As always, we smashed some bugs.
